settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account settings and preferences

settings.referralCodeNotAvailable: Referral code is being generated. Please refresh the page in a moment.
settings.updatePasswordDescription: Change your account password. Make sure to use a strong password.
settings.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long
settings.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long
settings.passwordsDoNotMatch: New password and confirmation do not match
settings.newPasswordMustBeDifferent: New password must be different from current password
settings.failedToUpdatePassword: Failed to update password. Please try again.
settings.referralLinksDescription: Share these links with your friends. When they sign up and purchase a course, you'll be credited as their referrer.
settings.showingFirst10Courses: Showing first 10 courses. Share these links to recommend specific courses to your friends.

projects.typeCriteriaAndPressEnter: Type criteria and press Enter to add
projects.selectPlatformAndPressEnter: Select a platform (or "All Platforms") and press Enter to add a criteria
projects.addCriteriaDescription: Add criteria that student videos should match. You can add criteria for all platforms or specific platforms. Set RPM (Rate Per Match) for each criteria.

enrollment.stepReviewDescription: Review all information before submitting your enrollment request
enrollment.reviewFinalDescription: Once you submit, your enrollment request will be sent for approval. You'll be notified once it's processed.
